pkgmetadata.longdescription: DE Analysis for Single-Cell RNA-Sequencing Data // Implements the TWO-Component Single Cell Model-Based Association Method (TWO- SIGMA) for gene-level differential expression (DE) analysis and DE-based gene set testing of single-cell RNA-sequencing datasets. See Van Buren et al. (2020) doi:10.1002/gepi.22361 and Van Buren et al. (2021) doi:10.1101/2021.01.24.427979.
